resources.string: Welcome to My Food App! this App is provided as a service to our visitors and may be used for informational purposes only. Because the Terms and Conditions contain legal obligations, please read them carefully.By using this app, you agree to abide by our terms and conditions. These include compliance with applicable laws, responsible use of the app\'s features, and respect for the rights of others. We may collect and process your data as outlined in our privacy policy. Failure to adhere to these terms may result in account suspension or termination.
